decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The access doorway to the shop shall have a minimum clear width of 900mm, a level surface or ramp between the pavement and the floor, a door handle of not more than 1m above ground level and glass entrance doors and glazed screens must be clearly defined with manifestation on the glass at two levels: 850 mm to 1000 mm and 1400 mm to 1600 mm. The manifestation should be a sign or logo at least 150 mm high.
description: Alterations to shop front with entrance to the existing first floor flat.
